short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly view airport METARs easily within your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The projectFLY METAR Viewer allows you to easily view METARs within your browser by simply clicking the icon and clicking 'Request'. As easy as it gets.
